divs: Sighting DetailsI was at the corner of Bethel and Godown rd in Columbus Ohio. I first noticed them when I left my store to drive down the street to the gas station. At first I thought they might be planes. I watched them group and spread out and was amazed. I They eventually faded into the western sky.
trends: There have been 70 other sightings in Columbus
There were no other sightings in Columbus on or around August 18th 2012
Summary: 9 flashing red lights in a stretched out s formation that eventually spread out equidistant from one another and flew west glowing a solid red.
